description:
In "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of Viviter where you can play with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Ninjutsu FUSUMA" mini-game!
It seems the lord has once again fallen asleep without closing the fusuma... This won't do; it must be quite chilly.
If by chance the lord were to catch a cold, it would be quite troublesome. Leave it to us, the shinobi.
The art of stealthily closing the fusuma is a ninja technique. With this, the lord should be able to sleep soundly without even noticing.
name: Additional mini-game "Ninjutsu FUSUMA"
